Milestone.milestoneText: View the permissions for the sales data workbook.

guidedStep.guidedText:
In Windows Explorer, navigate to the C:\084892Data\Collaborating with Others folder and open quarterly sales.xlsx. This will be done for you.

>> Click Next to continue.
In the Microsoft Office Excel message box that states that permission to the workbook is restricted, click OK.

In the workbook, observe that a message bar is displayed below the Ribbon, indicating that the permission is restricted to the workbook.

>> Click Next to continue.
On the message bar, click View Permission to display the My Permission dialog box.

In the My Permission dialog box, observe that you have the permission to view, edit, copy, and save the workbook.

>> Click Next to continue.
In the My Permission dialog box, click OK.

guidedStep.guidedText: In the selected cell, delete the value and type 300
